0d6a36ff-f4a5-4ab8-8e96-daa05a5fd055.name: Increased ST for lower body
0d6a36ff-f4a5-4ab8-8e96-daa05a5fd055.notes: Lifting only, no fine manipulators (-40%), SM 1 (-10%)

6bb9c6d9-9631-4568-9589-19d05ebc7904.name: Enhanced Move (Running)
6bb9c6d9-9631-4568-9589-19d05ebc7904.notes: Multiply normal Running Move by 1 + level

4a6ffbf5-fda9-48ff-9b72-98b36e9687dc.name: Claustrophobia (Enclosed Spaces)
4a6ffbf5-fda9-48ff-9b72-98b36e9687dc.notes: You are uncomfortable any time you can’t see the sky – or at least a very high ceiling. In a small room or vehicle, you feel the walls closing in on you... You need air! This is a dangerous fear for someone who plans to go underground.

features.situation: from others who can see your looks

f5fe9e1e-629f-407f-99df-0713dec97699.text: Onocentaurs have the head, torso and arms of a human and the body, legs and tail of a donkey.  Their upper bodies are very hairy and they have a donkey's long shaggy ears.
